Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 31st/Central Park
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Millard,32nd and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near 31st/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Millard, 32nd and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near 31st/Central Park.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #51 51st  Temporary Reroute near 51st/Lowe
ShortDescription: Revised: 51 51st buses temp rerouted EB via 51st, Halsted, 55th, Wentworth and 51st; WB: 51st, 47th, Halsted, and 51st due to street blockage near 51st/Lowe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 51st/Lowe, due to street blockage near 51st/Lowe.

Eastbound buses will operate via 51st, Halsted, 55th, Wentworth, then resume their normal route on 51st due street blockage near 51st/Lowe.

Westbound buses will operate via 51st, 47th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 51st due street blockage near 51st/Lowe.

Allow extra travel time.
